message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I've done some research and I've seen similar products selling for that price.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $120 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $180. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $180 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
